text: The Center for Global Food Issues is a project of the Hudson Institute, a conservative U.S. think tank. It describes its aims as to promote agricultural free trade, encourage technical innovation in agriculture, and raise environmental awareness among farmers.About CGFI . www.cgfi.org. Retrieved 23 November 2014. The Center has received criticism from the Union of Concerned ScientistsDialogue . Earthwise. Volume 7 Number 1. Retrieved 12 November 2007. and other organizations. Dennis Avery is the Director. His son, Alex Avery, is the Director of Research and Education.Alex Avery . GM Watch profile.
